trans-unit.source: Data Lake Analytics makes the complex task of managing distributed infrastructure and complex code easy.
trans-unit.target: Data Lake Analytics makes the complex task of managing distributed infrastructure and complex code easy.

trans-unit.source: It dynamically provisions resources and lets you do analytics on exabytes of data.
trans-unit.target: It dynamically provisions resources and lets you do analytics on exabytes of data.

trans-unit.source: When the job completes, it winds down resources automatically, and you pay only for the processing power used.
trans-unit.target: When the job completes, it winds down resources automatically, and you pay only for the processing power used.

trans-unit.source: As you increase or decrease the size of data stored or the amount of compute used, you don’t have to rewrite code.
trans-unit.target: As you increase or decrease the size of data stored or the amount of compute used, you don’t have to rewrite code.

trans-unit.source: Many of the default limits can be easily raised for your subscription by contacting support.
trans-unit.target: Many of the default limits can be easily raised for your subscription by contacting support.
